name: SupportKyleAndSyrene
_source: speak;Kyle;You're Selena, aren't you?|Commander of Frelia's pegasus knights?
speak;Syrene;I am.|And I know who you are.|You are Sir Kyle, cavalier of Renais.
speak;Kyle;I'm honored that you know my name.|I don't believe we've met, have we?
speak;Syrene;We met once, about ten years ago or so.|You may have forgotten.
speak;Kyle;Do I ever!|I didn't think I'd ever see you again.
speak;Syrene;Well, Sir Kyle, you certainly have turned out well.
speak;Kyle;Oh, please.|Let's do away with the honorifics, shall we?
speak;Syrene;Of course, Kyle.|Ah, you haven't changed at all.|It takes me back.
speak;Kyle;I barely recognized you, Syrene.|You look completely changed.|I had no idea you'd become a knight-a pegasus knight, no less!
speak;Syrene;That's nice of you to say.|So I've grown, have I?
speak;Kyle;You've grown a lot.|It's a shame we have to be reunited on a battlefield.
speak;Syrene;You're right about that.|We ought to sit down and talk soon.
speak;Kyle;I'd like that, too, Syrene.|But let's finish off this lot first, shall we?
speak;Syrene;All right, but don't try to be a hero like last time, all right?
speak;Syrene;Well, that's your homework.|See if you can't remember.
speak;Syrene;How are you holding up, Kyle?
speak;Kyle;The war is tough, but my sword arm is strong, and I am well.
speak;Kyle;Stuffy?|It's accurate.|Isn't that enough?|But that's beside the point.|I still can't figure out what you were talking about.

speak;Syrene;Oh, your homework?|You've been thinking about it all this time?|You're so serious!|I was right.|You haven't changed in the slightest.|You've always been this way.|Remember when I tried to show you around Frelia's castle town?|You said, “I'm here to do my duty.|Not to sightsee,”|and you went back inside.|You went home without even trying Frelia's fabulous seafood!|King Hayden thought I'd been remiss in showing you our fair city.
speak;Kyle;I'm sorry about that, Syrene.|I had no idea...|I was on a special mission to deliver a letter to King Hayden.|I didn't have any time for sightseeing, like I'd said.
speak;Syrene;Are you seriously apologizing for that?|It was so long ago!

speak;Kyle;Ha ha ha...|You're right, you're right.|...I know I was only there for three days, but that was a memorable trip.|I grew up in landlocked Renais.|I'd never seen the ocean.|Not before you showed it to me.
speak;Syrene;You didn't show any interest at all in local culture or cuisine.|But when I asked if you'd like to go to the sea, you got so excited!
speak;Kyle;It was intense.|I felt so small, standing there, staring at the sea.|Looking over the waves, I hoped that I could be that strong, that persistent.
speak;Syrene;I think that's the only time I've ever seen the real you.|I know we only spent a half day together, but it was such fun.
speak;Syrene;Maybe sometime, we can do that again.
speak;Kyle;I'd like that.|Let's use that hope to drive us on.|When we've restored peace, we'll go see the Frelian coast again.
speak;Syrene;No, I'm fine, but I'm worried about my pegasus...

speak;Kyle;Here, let me take a look.|Hm.|Looks like he's got a wound here that hasn't properly healed.|I can fix this up for you.|It's nothing serious, but you might want to get him some proper care later.
speak;Syrene;Thanks, Kyle.|You're a lifesaver.|It was careless of me not to have noticed the injury.
speak;Kyle;Your pegasus is smart.|He may have hidden it from you so as not to worry you.|It's not your fault, Syrene.|You shouldn't worry about it.
speak;Syrene;No, I'm just not fit to be a pegasus knight.|I'm so pitiful.|If you hadn't seen that injury, I could have put us both in danger.|I could have cost us both our lives.
speak;Kyle;You're being too hard on yourself.|If you were in danger, I would have been at your side in an instant.|I'm sure you would do the same, wouldn't you?
speak;Kyle;We just have to help one another out if something happens.|You and I have been friends for over ten years, after all.
speak;Kyle;That's right, Syrene.|You did the same for me back then.

speak;Kyle;It was on the day I left Frelia.|Near the border, I came upon some bandits harassing a poor merchant.|I tried to help him, but I was outnumbered.|Badly.|When they saw I was a knight, they wasted no time surrounding me.|I thought that was it for me, but then, out of nowhere, you show up.|You and I drove off those bandits, and you saved my life that day.
speak;Syrene;I see you've finished your homework.
speak;Kyle;Oh, so that's what you wanted me to remember!|“Don't be a hero” indeed!

speak;Syrene;You'd left Frelia before I could give you a going-away present.|I went out, hoping to catch up to you, when I saw you surrounded by bandits.|You were fighting all those bandits on your own to save that merchant...|I'd never seen a knight so dedicated to the protection of the innocent.
speak;Kyle;Going-away present...|You're talking about this, aren't you?
speak;Syrene;The wooden pegasus I carved for you!|...You still have it?

speak;Kyle;Of course I do!|After we dealt with those bandits, you said to me, “Keep this, and remember Frelia.”|How could I possibly misplace it?|I carry it with me as a reminder.|As long as I have this, I feel like I'll always have someone watching over me.|Actually, I started collecting wooden figurines since you gave me this.|But I always carry this one on me.
speak;Syrene;I'm glad to hear it's meant so much to you.
speak;Syrene;...Kyle...|When we're all at peace again, won't you visit Frelia once more?

speak;Kyle;You know...|I was thinking about that, too.|I think I really missed out by not having Frelian seafood.|This time around, I won't miss it.|And I should see some sights, too.|Will you show me around, Syrene?
speak;Syrene;Yes, I'd love to.|I've been told I can fry up a mean fish, too!
